choose.otherwise: select p.no, p.title, p.contents, date_format(p.reg_date,'%Y/%m/%d') as regDate , p.category_no as categoryNo from post p join category c on(p.category_no = c.no) where c.id = #{id} order by no desc

mapper.select: select c.no, c.name, c.description, ifnull(count(p.no),0) as count from category c left join post p on(c.no = p.category_no) where id = #{id} group by c.name order by 1 desc
